I now this probably isn't the right section for this question, but I couldn't think it would fit anywhere else. Now, my question is, what is a program where I can video record what is happening in my game, the game being KSP. So a program like FRAPS, except I need it to be completely free with no registration with up to or more than half an hour of recording time. Please help, I would like to record all my amazing fails (and sometimes wins) on video. Thanks to anyone who helps!!

Note: MODERATORS - please do not yell at me for putting this in here, I seriously couldn't think about where I should put this.
So you want something for free, but is better than fraps? Camstudio is the first search result.

So you want something for free, but is better than fraps? Camstudio is the first search result.

Well, longer recording time with no registration anyway.

And thanks for the Cam studio suggestion, I think it will do. I've looked at it but havn't downloaded yet. I might soon though.
I've used camstudio before. It's pretty decent

I've used camstudio before. It's pretty decent

Camstudio, IT WILL BE!!!
If you use mac, use quicktime player, it can do webcam, screen, and just audio recordings.

I use Evolve. It's a Video Recorder (On YT with a raw video it's 360p), Screenshotter, and in-game time recorder (How long you've been in-game). It's got a lot of other features also. I personally call it "Steam without Steam".

evolvehq.com
Playclaw is pretty good if you don't mind a small watermark floating on your screen with the free version.
